Instruction: Boil a pot of lightly salted water. Cook pasta until al dente, for about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet over medium heat, sauté garlic in olive oil until golden.
Simmer for 30 minutes after adding the tomato sauce, oregano, and salt, stir then cover. Pour the sauce over the cooked pasta, toss to coat well, and serve.
